name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellant, v. Richard E. BEACH, Appellee

judges: Before FLAHERTY, C.J., and ZAPPALA, CAPPY, CASTILLE, NIGRO, NEWMAN and SAYLOR, JJ.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellant, v. Richard E. BEACH, Appellee.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
Based upon our disposition in Commonwealth v. Williams, 557 Pa. 285, 733 A.2d 593 (1999), we affirm the Order of the Venango County Court of Common Pleas dated March 30, 1999. Furthermore, we remand the matter to the common pleas court for disposition of any remaining issues.
Jurisdiction is relinquished.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: Elissa Stuttler, Franklin, for Richard Beach.
casebody.head_matter:
734 A.2d 1276
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellant, v. Richard E. BEACH, Appellee.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Submitted Aug. 9, 1999.
Decided Sept. 8, 1999.
Robert Grossi, Franklin, for Com.
Elissa Stuttler, Franklin, for Richard Beach.
Before FLAHERTY, C.J., and ZAPPALA, CAPPY, CASTILLE, NIGRO, NEWMAN and SAYLOR, JJ.
